topics.body:
So I don't know a thing about professional level boxing, just to get that out of the way.
[spoiler]But I'm PRETTY sure that blocking an incoming punch with your elbow is *highly* illegal.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54af4ab963687216de3a0200#post_54af4ab963687216de3a0200
all i know about boxing is punch-out

so yeah anything goes
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54af4ab963687216de3a0200#post_54af4ab963687216de3a0200

It's only illegal if the elbow is separated from the torso.

If the guy punched the elbow at the time you raised your arms might head a warning, or the elbow disjointed if the punch was strong enough
